duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides superior customer service and takes orders from customers by telephone or in person, answering customer questions regarding products and assisting them with selections.
Prepares, packages, and merchandises fresh product effectively, ensuring food safety and sanitation standards are maintained.
Uses suggestive selling techniques and basic product knowledge to meet customer needs and build department sales.
Cleans and sanitizes display cases, operates/maintains equipment properly, and complies with H-E-B food safety and sanitation standards and department/store operating procedures.
Records production and shrink to aid in production planning, assists in technical areas as needed, and culls bakery products for poor quality and expiration dates.

Takes care of service counter customers, uses ordering system applications, performs inventory management processes, ensures catering orders are prepared, and performs all sanitation and maintenance tasks for Deli slicers.

Serves/packages products at customer's request, educates customers on preparation/reheating instructions of prepared foods, prepackages condiments for prepared food items, and cuts, slices, dices, chops food in preparation for chef.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, completion of Company Orientation, and food safety and sanitation training upon hire
